channel.description: Recent content in web on Morgoth

item.title: Web
item.description: WEB web一般包括web server, web service, load balancing. URL: Uniform Resource Locator, 统一资源定位符． scheme://host[:port#]/path/.../[?query-string][#anchor] DNS: Domain Name System, 域名系统. header: header中用来保存session，cookie等头部信息．
